summary: The diff removes PhotoSlot imports from the visible portions of PostYesMovieDatePage and ValentineAskPage and replaces the movie-date photo area with a static poster/details layout. However, PhotoSlot.tsx is still present and described as a full upload component, and the diff also appears to introduce/describe additional "evasive No button" behavior that was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove or retire the PhotoSlot component so it is not used anywhere in the frontend build (delete the file if unused, or leave it but ensure there are no imports/usages).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows PhotoSlot.tsx still exists and is described as an active upload component; the provided diff summary does not provide evidence that there are zero remaining imports/usages across the entire codebase.

hallucinated_features.description: New/changed behavior where the "No" button is evasive and cannot be clicked/tapped/keyboard-activated (moves on interaction).
hallucinated_features.reason: This behavior is not requested by any requirement; the BuildRequest focuses only on removing photo upload/add-photo UI from the Valentine flow.
